storyInfo: Croissant must clear out old stock to buy new machine oil, but trying to sell outdated goods is a headache.

attributes.content: Exusiai, any word from Croissant?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Yeah, she says yes.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She said we could store things here for a while if we run out of room at the office, but it's best to ask first.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The shopping festival sale completely stuffed the company warehouses. There's hardly any room to even step inside.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Yeah, we haven't been so busy in ages.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Never imagined there was so much storage space under Croissant's room.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She told me she rented two floors, one for living and one for storage.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: She's organized all the stuff into categories. Makes you feel better just looking at it.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Fruit cans... let's see... crafts, toiletries, clothing, food. Here, I think.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What are these boxes over here?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Magnificent Machine Oil?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Exusiai! Came as soon as I heard. Didja find a place fer yer stuff?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yes, but... I saw a bunch of machine oil over there. How did you get the goods so quickly?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You still had money left? Didn't you just borrow some from me last month to buy a bunch of cloth?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's the old kind I had in stock. I was thinkin' about sellin' it to raise the capital to buy the new stuff.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Will people really buy obsolete ones like these?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It's from early this year, but it's still good to use. And cheaper'n the new kind. I'm sure I'll have takers.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Just from early this year? Wow, they sure release updates fast.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Two new versions in a year. Yep, they must put some juice into R&D.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Croissant...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: What's on yer mind, Sora?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It'd be hard for me to guarantee quality if a record company wanted me to release two albums in a year, but I don't know the situation here...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: S'fine, I've used this machine oil fer ages. The quality's good.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Rusty machines? Wear and tear? Joints getting stuck?
attributes.name: Car Radio

attributes.content: Get the latest Magnificent Machine Oil now! Temperature and oxidation-resistant, high viscosity and high purity. It's the best option!
attributes.name: Car Radio

attributes.content: A new secret ingredient keeps your machinery running good-as-new. Discover brand-new experiences with five different effects.
attributes.name: Car Radio

attributes.content: Buy a whole set and enjoy a secret bonus. Live life to the fullest. Choose Magnificent.
attributes.name: Car Radio

attributes.content: Can we turn the radio off?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Magnificent don't spare any expense on advertising, do they?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: New limited-edition machine oil in collaboration with famous Lungmen craftsman Tsui-Tsui! Get it online or in stores now.
attributes.name: Car Radio

attributes.content: The first hundred orders will also get a free set of maintenance tools, autographed by Tsui-Tsui. Call our hotline now!
attributes.name: Car Radio

attributes.content: Magnificent, the choice of a master. I am Tsui-Tsui, and I endorse this message.
attributes.name: Low Male Voice

attributes.content: Hey, ain't that the engineer who's all the rage on the video websites right now? Didn't think he'd do a collab with Magnificent. Guess he really likes the new product.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Word of mouth is the important thing. The opinion of one master doesn't mean much.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: People're linin' up to buy it. More popular'n I ever thought it could be.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Gotta stock up on a sure-seller like that!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It's a sure-seller, sure. What about your stock, though?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sigh... all the vendors what came to me were offerin' cents on the dollar, like they were colludin' or somethin'. Musta found out I need cash on short notice.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So what are you thinking? Are you selling?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'll hafta, if'n I don't get any news within the week.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It's what it is. You win some, and you lose some.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh, bless your heart. Makin' me feel better, Exusiai?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ahem. Watch the road, not me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Fragrances on sale now! Great deals on everything! All the fragrance you could want at shocking discounts! Call Dainty Fragrances at xxxxxxxx if interested.
attributes.name: Car Radio

attributes.content: Hah, looks like I ain't the only one tryin' to clear out stock.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That's a pretty stiff laugh, Croissant.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Live a healthier life with oat milk and coffee. One plus one can equal more than two.
attributes.name: Car Radio

attributes.content: Man, ads these days are just getting worse and worse.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What'cha mean? I thought it made a lot of sense.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Living a better life with oat milk and coffee?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Naw, the second bit.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: One plus one can equal more than two?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: That's the one.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: One moment, miss. The representative of Dainty Fragrances is just inside.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Mr. Chang, there's a young woman with an appointment here. Are you free right now?
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Show her in.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: Come on in, Miss.
attributes.name: Gentle Female Voice

attributes.content: Mornin', Mr. Chang. Sorry to show up all unannounced-like.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Not a problem, Miss. How should I call you?
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: Croissant's the name.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Very good, Croissant. May I ask why you're here?
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: Well, I happen to have some stock of Magnificent Machine Oil that I'm tryin' to get off my hands, but it's been mighty tough findin' a buyer.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I'm afraid we don't need any machine oil. We're having headaches trying to sell our own stock as it is.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: (Wags a finger)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I ain't tryin' to sell ya my goods.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Then why are you here?
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: I'm after a little cooperation.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Forgive me for being blunt, but it doesn't look like you have such great marketing channels yourself.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: And I ain't offerin' a channel, neither. I'm proposin' a strategy.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: A strategy?
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: Darn tootin'. A win-win strategy.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And what might that be?
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: We sell our stock in a package deal.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Outdated machine oil and out-of-fashion fragrance. Seems like a combination doomed to fail.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: My machine oil comes with a mighty strong smell. Tackin' on a fragrance helps clear that right up.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The real kicker's gonna be the variety of fragrances your company offers.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oil plus perfume ain't nothin' special, but the variety you got makes it interesting.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: We could even do up a 'random fragrance' package to add to the fun.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Nods approvingly)
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: Now, why don'tcha tell me what yer best-sellin' smell is?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Rose.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: Let's toss that one out as a free gift.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Why would we give away the one that sells the best?
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: We ain't just givin' it out. You gotta collect a couple other fragrance sets to get the free gift.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I see. What if we run out, though? We don't have a lot of rose fragrance in stock.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: In that case, we do a lucky draw.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ya get one chance at the draw for every full set of fragrance you collect.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I see. I can come up with something as a consolation prize, and we give out the machine oil and fragrances as the second and third prizes.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: But I'll need to think about the grand prize...
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: I'm thinkin' I'n offer the grand prize. It pains my heart, but it's all in the name of business.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: A poster autographed by Emperor himself.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Are you serious?!
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: Sure am... I've this feller fer a mighty long time.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Oh yeah, I get to put my Employee of the Year Award to good use. It's just takin' up space.)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: This discussion has been most illuminating, Croissant. Now, about the revenue share...
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: I believe it's only fair that my company gets a bigger cut, considering the major role that our fragrance plays.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: I'd say it's too early to talk about that. Let's put our heads together on a detailed sales strategy first.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Very well. Here's my card. Feel free to contact us at any time.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: That'd be lovely, Mr. Chang. Here's mine.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh—
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh, nothing. I've just never seen a business card so... cute.
attributes.name: Chang

attributes.content: Leaves an impression, don't it?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You're back. How did it go?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Mighty fine. We didn't settle on the revenue split though.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What's your plan?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Maybe I'll call him up now.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Gotta find his number. Flip through my rolodex here... boutique, appliances store, farm equipment, barber... here ya are, Dainty Fragrances.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Man, you have so many cards it's dragging on the ground. Do you have a detailed plan, though?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Detailed plan? Too early fer that.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Howdy, Mr. Chang? I dropped by earlier today.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yep, it's me, Croissant.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I just finished tallyin' up the goods and I'm ready to package 'em. There's just one thing...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: A workshop of sorts called me up. They're mighty interested in the oil...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: And, er... well, the lady offered an awful temptin' price.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: No, I ain't given 'em an answer yet. I'd love to work with a big company like yours, but...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sure, I understand, but business is business.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh no, she's comin'. Gimme a sec.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (She's one heck of an actress...)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Covers the receiver lightly)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What?! You really want my entire stock?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I-I couldn't do that. I promised to sell it as a bundle with a real nice pardner. I-It ain't about the money.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yer desperate? But... I just ain't sure... alright, I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Releases the receiver)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sorry to keep you waitin', Mr. Chang. They're awful persistent... they said they just got a big project and need a whole heap of machine oil.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You'll increase my share? A-Are ya sure?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Aw, I do appreciate that so very much. Thank you kindly! Would you have time tomorrow mornin' to pick up our chat? That'd be lovely. See ya tomorrow, Mr. Chang.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: You have a deal?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sure do.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Now I got the capital for new goods, and I'll also get to pay back my debt. That's some mighty fine luck.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Have you ever thought about a career in acting, Croissant?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Nah, ain't worth it... hey, you aren't serious, are you?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Shrugs)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Well... that went awful good.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Looks at her own reflection in the mirror)
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Go make that money, Croissant. If you don't, somebody else will.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That's the last box! Let's see... two left. Not bad! Made my money back even before I sold out.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I didn't understand why you would stock up like that, but now I guess it makes sense.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Mom n' Dad trained my instincts up like this. They're mighty precise.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Family of businessmen?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Guess so. I grew up helpin' out around their little shop. So their thinkin' and habits've rubbed off on me.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Have you found someone for the remaining machine oil?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Customer feedback was good, so I'm plannin' on keepin' it for myself.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Can I have a bottle?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You can have a whole box, if you want.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Checks the labels)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What'cha you lookin' for?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The ingredients. I need to know if it can be used on firearms.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh yeah, I was so busy procurin', I never had a chance to look at what they added to the new version.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I still got the old bottles. We could compare 'em.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Here we go! Let's see... what did they add?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: 75% mineral oil.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Same. Additives?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Viscosity improver, antioxidant, anti-corrosive...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't see anythin' different. What was the secret ingredient they were talkin' up in the ad?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Wait, there's something at the end... rose oxide?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Whassat? Lemme look it up... rose oxide is a fragrance chemical found in roses and rose oil.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: So all the new version added was a fragrance?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I feel... like I got played.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Well, you know what they say. Great minds think alike.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: (Pats Croissant on the shoulder)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Let's go. We have orders to deliver tonight.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Aren't you going, Croissant?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: One month later...
Why is there always a line here? It wraps all the way around the corner.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Must be some new product launch.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Brand-new Magnificent Machine Oil, now in stores! Elevate your experience and personalize your very own fragrance from one of a dozen options!
attributes.name: Screen Ad

attributes.content: Order now and get a mystery gift in partnership with Dainty Fragrances!
attributes.name: Screen Ad

attributes.content: Live life to the fullest. Choose Magnificent.
attributes.name: Screen Ad

attributes.content: Another new version? Didn't they just release one last month?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You think Croissant is in line?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You would think so, but...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm gonna guess she's not.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She's been pretty depressed lately. She turned down all my invitations to go shopping or eat together, and she's not even taking care of her business.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Did you know that the little warehouse she has is completely empty?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Looks like she got a big shock. All that effort to learn you've been played by the manufacturer...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: She's not gonna just give up, is she? I haven't seen her for days.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No idea, but I'm beginning to miss her bounciness, whether she made or lost money the day before.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Me too. But the name Dainty Fragrances does sound familiar.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: See, I was right. No Croissant.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Evenin', folks. Might I interest you in a new flavor of crispy meatballs after a hard day of work?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Are you guys going back? I'll give ya a ride.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: (Turns sideways)
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Ahem. Notice anything new?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Er... a new hairstyle?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Not me. The display window behind me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Oh, that. Yeah, I knew about it a week ago.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Wasn't this a new product released today?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Heard it from Magnificent myself. I introduced 'em to Chang, and they gave me a chance to buy their new product ahead of time, at a discount.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: No wonder it sounded familiar... you've stocked up on the new goods, then?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No, I turned 'em down.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Why? Isn't that a chance to make a bunch of money?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Nah, I decided not to get mixed up. I already got me a new sales plan.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What are you planning to sell?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Wow, these crispy meatballs are great!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Croissant
